channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Configuration as Code Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Configuration as Code Plugin

item.title: CVE-2019-10345|2024-08-04T22:17:20.474Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20configuration%20as%20code%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Configuration as Code Plugin 1.20 and earlier did not treat the proxy password as a secret to be masked when logging or encrypted for export.

item.title: CVE-2019-10367|2024-08-04T22:17:20.402Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20configuration%20as%20code%20plugin
item.description: Due to an incomplete fix of CVE-2019-10343, Jenkins Configuration as Code Plugin 1.26 and earlier did not properly apply masking to some values expected to be hidden when logging the configuration being applied.

item.title: CVE-2019-10363|2024-08-04T22:17:20.370Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20configuration%20as%20code%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Configuration as Code Plugin 1.24 and earlier did not reliably identify sensitive values expected to be exported in their encrypted form.

item.title: CVE-2019-10343|2024-08-04T22:17:20.486Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20configuration%20as%20code%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Configuration as Code Plugin 1.24 and earlier did not properly apply masking to values expected to be hidden when logging the configuration being applied.

item.title: CVE-2019-10362|2024-08-04T22:17:20.521Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20configuration%20as%20code%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Configuration as Code Plugin 1.24 and earlier did not escape values resulting in variable interpolation during configuration import when exporting, allowing attackers with permission to change Jenkins system configuration to obtain the values of environment variables.

item.title: CVE-2019-10344|2024-08-04T22:17:20.383Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20configuration%20as%20code%20plugin
item.description: Missing permission checks in Jenkins Configuration as Code Plugin 1.24 and earlier in various HTTP endpoints allowed users with Overall/Read access to access the generated schema and documentation for this plugin containing detailed information about installed plugins.
